Articles.Content:
Thought i would say Hi to everyone, finally joined the forum.

 

Was given KSP as a secret santa christmas present 2 years ago. Best present i have had for a long time but my wife would not agree with that. Had to get a new PC to get the full KSP experience and have managed to lose 701 hours to boldly take kerbals to new frontiers (and some times only a few hundred meters, damn staging)

 

Anyway hi everyone..!
Welcome aboard! I'm on a similar boat, my family just built a brand-new PC a few weeks ago. It's been nice.
